title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 171.2 - Issuance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 171.2 - Issuance

State Regulations

An applicant for a nondriver identification card is
required to have his/her photograph taken as part of the identification card
procedure. Such applicant may not wear dark eyeglasses, makeup or apparel which
when photographed would obscure the applicant's face or make identification
difficult. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
171.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
